name: Petite Pincushion - Pumpkin
description:
This sweet little pincushion is perfect for the fall season.  Measuring at 1.5"x1.5" this pumpkin pincushion would make a lovely gift for a friend or sewing enthusiast.  

The Petite Pincushions are made from a recycled bottle cap, felt, and stuffing.  What better way to say "I'm thinking of you!" than with a Pumpkin Petite Pincushion.

name: Country Ornament
description:
Full of country charm, this simple ornament is the perfect addition for any Christmas tree.  This ornament has batting and holiday fabric on both sides.  Large stitches outline the edges and the center boasts a cute, holiday button.  The ornament is finished off with a ribbon and thread hanger.

Use this as a fun tag on a gift, or give this as a little thank you or stocking stuffer, or keep it for yourself.  Measuring 2"x2", this is the perfect thing to add just a little something special.

There are other options of buttons and fabric style.  Just send me an e-mail if you would like to see what I have available or to request something special.

name: Casserole Carrier
description: The time for holiday parties and potlucks is quickly approaching.  This casserole carrier is the perfect thing to bring that hot dish of green bean casserole or a cold macaroni salad.  Simply slide the dish into the carrier, tie the cord, and you're good to go.

name: Hanging Kitchen Towel
description:
This fall kitchen towel is the perfect accent for any kitchen.  Designed to look like a doll's dress, this towel can easily hang over the oven handle or a towel rack.  Velcro closures keep the towel secure and safe from falling off.

Not only is the towel decorative, it is also utilitarian.  This would make the perfect hostess gift, thank you gift, or simply keep it for yourself.

I can also customize a towel to fit your decor or style.  Just send an e-mail to specify what color or theme you'd like and I will do my best to make something you'll love.
